name: Deus Ex: Human Revolution - The Missing Link
name_original: Deus Ex: Human Revolution - The Missing Link
description:
Deus Ex: Human Revolution - The Missing Link is an action, shooter and RPG game developed by Eidos Montreal and Nixxes. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by Square Enix. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Deus Ex: Human Revolution - The Missing Link on PC, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
David Anfossi produced the game. It was directed by Jean-François Dugas. It was scored by Michael McCann.
